column4: hey there, there seems to be a problem between winff and ffmpeg on 12.04. the presets in winff don'twork with the supplied version of ffmpeg. anyone else having this?
all presets or presets for MP4?
the presents for DVD are off (use a -mv0 argument that doesn't work)
sorry was just asking about MP4 specifically.  Don't know about other issues with ffmpeg, good luck.
